pullRequest.title: PHOENIX-6148 & PHOENIX-6149 : [SchemaExtractionTool] DDL parsing exception in Phoenix…

nodes.bodyText: Is this a bug in SchemaUtil.getQualfiedTableName? This seems like something we shouldn't have to repeat everywhere.

nodes.bodyText: Why not add this function to SchemaUtil class itself?
what does digit in the first position signify? Perhaps add a comment as well.

beforeCommit.message: PHOENIX-6148: [SchemaExtractionTool] DDL parsing exception in Phoenix in view name

afterCommit.message: PHOENIX-6148: [SchemaExtractionTool] DDL parsing exception in Phoenix in view name

nodes.bodyText: Nit: given this comment, shouldn't we check that the string beginning with a digit is actually a number and not something like '72HOURS'? :)
